website_summaries.verdict: The Nike Flystepper 2K3 PRMs are brightly-hued lifestyle sneakers that look even better in actual than is pictured online. The shoes are comfortable with an attention-grabbing design that’s meant to turn heads. The quality does not lag behind either as users have praised the shoes for being well-made. They do cost more than other shoes and the fit runs small.
pros: Most reviewers loved the “amazing” design of the Nike Flystepper 2K3 PRM shoes which they say “spruce up outfits that need a little flavor.”
Many testers found the casual high-top sneakers to be comfortable
Several purchasers remarked that the Nike Flystepper 2K3 PRM are “dope shoes overall” because they look and feel amazing and have a high-quality make
Many users mentioned owning more than a pair of the lifestyle kicks
The color of the high-top footwear is more intense in person than pictured, a good number of buyers noted
A few people were pleased with the quality of the shoes, which they called top-notch
cons: Several purchasers were not pleased to find out that the Nike Flystepper 2K3 PRM sneakers had a too small fit
The casual high-tops need a breaking-in period stated some individuals who said that the back of the shoe felt pretty stiff and painful at first
A few users thought that the lifestyle shoes were overpriced

customer_reviews.title: White/white is more like white/grey!
customer_reviews.text: I love the style of the shoe but I’m not a fan of the white that I bought. If you want WHITE shoes order the platinum or other style not White/white. The gum around the shoe is true white but the actual shoes are off white grayish color. Attached picture with the shoes on top of a white t shirt for color reference. Sadly I didn’t notice this until I had worn them outside, so I can’t return them. If I can sell them on eBay or Craigslist I will come back and try to find a pair in the true white style. I do think I’m gonna buy the black/chrome style though 😁
customer_reviews.author: FGFitness Tanner

customer_reviews.title: These are great shoes but unfortunately the back of the shoes rubs ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes but unfortunately the back of the shoes rubs against my ankle and caused a blister. I don't know if it will get better as I wear it but so far the back of the shoe is pretty stiff and there for painful to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible stitching in the heel. Painful to walk in.
customer_reviews.text: The heel Stiches are like a cheese grater on the achilles tendon of the heel. I was bleeding with in a few minutes of walking in them. These are garbage.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Truly a fly shoe
customer_reviews.text: Omg, I saw my older brother with these on in January, and I went on a mission to find dem😳. Now that I wear dem, every one is ask me the famous line, “what are those.” 😂
customer_reviews.author: Marfeus

customer_reviews.title: They was a great price
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, very trendy I want the all blue ones now
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Williams

customer_reviews.title: Boo hiss
customer_reviews.text: Great looking sneakers but not as comfortable as they should bec for Nike.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Kontos

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves them!
customer_reviews.text: I paid double the shelf price but it it was hard to find. Hubby loved it, i guess thats all that matters...
customer_reviews.author: Krystal P.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoes. I returned the shoes for a larger size but never received my shoes again or refund.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looks nice but the fit is to small. I wear a 11 but need a larger size up.
customer_reviews.author: Demetric Rhabb

customer_reviews.title: Hot Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe extra cute arrived on time will def purchase from seller again
customer_reviews.author: CutieQ

customer_reviews.title: Return
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were kinda dirty when I got them and I would like to refund them
customer_reviews.author: john jones

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a pair of solid black shoes for the past month or so. I've purchased 3, and this one is by far the best. The material feels great. I strongly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Abdullah

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with my sneakers and they arrived on time. Thanks Sam
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Too small, the other pair I have already are noticeably bigger. Both size 12
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Flystepper 2k3 PRM Basketball Shoes
